      • appendText

        public void appendText(@NonNull
                       String text)
        Appends text to the first empty row of the area. If there are no empty rows, then the first row is discarded and all rows are moved up, then the new text is appended to the bottom row.
        Parameters:
        text - The new text.

      • appendText

        public void appendText(@NonNull
                       AsciiString text)
        Appends text to the first empty row of the area. If there are no empty rows, then the first row is discarded and all rows are moved up, then the new text is appended to the bottom row.
        Parameters:
        text - The new text.
